CustomField.description: Number of days after which survey responses that have not been started will be deleted.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specify the number of days after which survey responses that have not been started will be automatically deleted. To activate this feature, ensure that the scheduled job "SurveyOperationsSchedulable" is activated. This setting helps manage and clean up survey responses that have not been initiated by participants within the specified timeframe.
CustomField.label: Delete Not Started Surveys after Days
